name: Time Miner V3
description:
The Premise of 'Time Miner' is that you are a young adventurer that has somehow managed to end up on an alien world. While you are on this alien world, you discover an evil corporation known as 'MEGA' who want to destroy the planet's hidden treasures. You must collect these treasures and avoid the enemies

INSTRUCTIONS 

D key or RightArrow to move right

A key or LeftArrow to move left

Spacebar to jump

**avoid the water....**
